methods.Synopsis: Process an action through all the game rules defined for a clients website.

parameters.Name: player_id
parameters.Description: player id as used in client's website

parameters.Name: url
parameters.Description: URL of the page that trigger the action or any identifier string - Used for logging, URL specific rules, and rules that trigger only when a specific identifier string is supplied

parameters.Name: reward
parameters.Description: name of the point-based reward to give to player, if the action trigger custom-point reward that doesn't specify reward name

parameters.Name: quantity
parameters.Description: amount of the point-based reward to give to player, if the action trigger custom-point reward that doesn't specify reward quantity

parameters.Name: rule_id
parameters.Description: if needed, you can also specify a rule id so that rule engine will only process against that rule

parameters.Name: node_id
parameters.Description: if needed, you can also specify a node id so that rule engine will process with that rule

parameters.Name: session_id
parameters.Description: you can specify a session id to extend expire session time for that player

methods.Synopsis: Retrieve content(s) by specified filter fields

parameters.Name: date_check
parameters.Description: Return content that available in this date range

parameters.Name: order
parameters.Description: Direction to order ('desc', 'asc'), but if sort is 'random' then this field will be seed number

parameters.Name: status
parameters.Description: Specify status of the content to find. Possible values are true, false and all. The default value is true

parameters.Name: player_id
parameters.Description: Display content with given player id

parameters.Name: only_new_content
parameters.Description: true = Display content which the player does not provide any action (like/dislike) yet, false = Display content which the player has already provided an action (like/dislike)

parameters.Name: only_new_feedback
parameters.Description: true = Display content which the player does not give feedback yet, false = Display content which the player has given the feedback
